name: Warzechian Armguards
flavorText: "After a long search through the eastern lands, the noble leaders of House Chien chose the Haroutunian Clan for their personal guard. These loyal protectors are easily recognized by the distinctive armguards they wear out of pride for their service." —Abd al-Hazir, The Xiansai Chronicles
flavorTextHtml:
"After a long search through the eastern lands, the noble leaders of House Chien chose the Haroutunian
Clan for their personal guard. These loyal protectors are easily recognized by the distinctive armguards they wear out of pride for their service." —Abd al-Hazir, The Xiansai Chronicles

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [4.5 - 6.0]%

secondary.textHtml: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.
secondary.text: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.

secondary.textHtml: Every time you destroy a wreckable object, you gain a short burst of speed.
secondary.text: Every time you destroy a wreckable object, you gain a short burst of speed.
